alert.note: Alert for Creek; Osage; Pawnee; Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:26AM CDT until July 21 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OSAGE...CREEK...PAWNEE AND WEST CENTRAL TULSA COUNTIES... At 525 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Blackburn to 2 miles south of Terlton to 2 miles northeast of Shamrock, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Sand Springs... Bristow... Pawnee... Sapulpa... Hominy... Cleveland... Mannford... Drumright... Kellyville... Oilton... Jennings... Avant... Westport... Osage... Slick... Hallett... Blackburn... Terlton... Shamrock... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 185 and 216. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
